issue.title: [Rust] Buffer::from_slice_ref incorrect capacity
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-12504](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12504). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Buffer::from_slice_ref sets the capacity without taking into account the size of the slice elements
